description:
Akiko is http://anidb.net/ch45096 [Akito]`s little twin sister. She`s a sophomore at Saint Liliana Academy and Student Council Secretary. She`s a splendid lady, who can behave properly in any setting, but she has also has an extreme brother complex. She loves her brother romantically, and takes pride in that fact.
However, unbeknownst to Akiko, Akito is adopted, and therefore they are not twins.
Source: ANN
name: Himenokouji Akiko
